## BaseModel class

实现了CommonModel的Model基类

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class BaseModel<TModuleState extends ModuleState = {}, TStoreState extends StoreState = {}> implements CommonModel 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [CommonModel](./react-taro.commonmodel.md)

## Remarks

Model基类实现了[CommonModel](./react-taro.commonmodel.md)<!-- -->，并提供了一些常用的方法

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(moduleName, store)](./react-taro.basemodel._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>BaseModel</code> class |

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [actions](./react-taro.basemodel.actions.md) |  | [PickThisActions](./react-taro.pickthisactions.md)<!-- -->&lt;this&gt; | 获取本模块的<code>公开actions</code>构造器 |
|  [moduleName](./react-taro.basemodel.modulename.md) |  | string |  |
|  [state](./react-taro.basemodel.state.md) |  | TModuleState | 当前模块的状态 |
|  [store](./react-taro.basemodel.store.md) |  | [IStore](./react-taro.istore.md)<!-- -->&lt;TStoreState&gt; | 被关联的 store |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [\_initState(state)](./react-taro.basemodel._initstate.md) |  | reducer 监听 <code>moduleName._initState</code> Action，注入初始状态 |
|  [\_loadingState(loadingState)](./react-taro.basemodel._loadingstate.md) |  | reducer 监听 <code>moduleName._loadingState</code> Action，合并至当前状态 |
|  [\_updateState(subject, state)](./react-taro.basemodel._updatestate.md) |  | reducer 监听 <code>moduleName._updateState Action</code>，合并至当前状态 |
|  [dispatch(action)](./react-taro.basemodel.dispatch.md) |  | 等同于this.store.dispatch(action) |
|  [getCurrentAction()](./react-taro.basemodel.getcurrentaction.md) |  | 获取当前触发的action.type |
|  [getPrevState()](./react-taro.basemodel.getprevstate.md) |  | 获取本模块路由跳转之前的状态 |
|  [getPrivateActions(actionsMap)](./react-taro.basemodel.getprivateactions.md) |  | 获取本模块的<code>私有actions</code>构造器 |
|  [getRootState(type)](./react-taro.basemodel.getrootstate.md) |  | 获取 Store 的全部状态 |
|  [getRouter()](./react-taro.basemodel.getrouter.md) |  | 获取关联的 Router |
|  [onActive()](./react-taro.basemodel.onactive.md) |  | 当某 store 被路由置于最顶层时，所有该 store 中被挂载的 model 会触发 |
|  [onInactive()](./react-taro.basemodel.oninactive.md) |  | 当某 store 被路由置于非顶层时，所有该 store 中被挂载的 model 会触发 |
|  [onMount(env)](./react-taro.basemodel.onmount.md) |  | 该 model 被挂载到 store 时触发，在一个 store 中 一个 model 只会被挂载一次 |
